payload.description: Update advisor_notes.py to support 'superadmin' role. Replace all occurrences of `user_response.data.get('role') == 'admin'` with `user_response.data.get('role') in ['admin', 'superadmin']` (4 occurrences at lines 38, 101, 188, 229)
payload.context: Adding proper superadmin role differentiation. Superadmins should have same permissions as admins for advisor notes.
